greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Primes p such that p-1 has 3 distinct prime factors.
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {forprime(p=1, nn, if (omega(p-1) == 3, print1(p, ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 22 2013
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Feb 23 2002
